languages.text: {n}Почти прозрачная кожа плотно обтягивает сгорбленный скелет старика. Вероятно, кроме этого мусора у него в жизни и правда больше ничего нет.{/n}
{n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Почти прозрачная кожа плотно обтягивает сгорбленный скелет старика. Вероятно, кроме этого мусора у него в жизни и правда больше ничего нет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The skin tightly enveloping the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk likely really is everything he owns in this life.{/n}

{n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La piel marchitada que cubre el esqueleto jorobado del hombre es casi translúcida. Es probable que ese montón de basura sea todo lo que posee en su vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La piel marchitada que cubre el esqueleto jorobado del hombre es casi translúcida. Es probable que ese montón de basura sea todo lo que posee en su vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}猫背の男の骨格を囲むように知人だ皮膚は、ほぼ半透明だ。そのガラクタの山は、真実、彼が現世で所有するすべてなのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}猫背の男の骨格を囲むように知人だ皮膚は、ほぼ半透明だ。そのガラクタの山は、真実、彼が現世で所有するすべてなのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人驼着背，驼背周围的皮肤几乎变成了半透明。他手边的那堆垃圾很可能就是他的全部财产。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人驼着背，驼背周围的皮肤几乎变成了半透明。他手边的那堆垃圾很可能就是他的全部财产。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die geschrumpfte Haut um das gebeugte Skelett des Mannes ist beinahe durchsichtig. Der Müllhaufen ist wahrscheinlich wirklich sein gesamter Besitz in diesem Leben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die geschrumpfte Haut um das gebeugte Skelett des Mannes ist beinahe durchsichtig. Der Müllhaufen ist wahrscheinlich wirklich sein gesamter Besitz in diesem Leben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous pouvez deviner le squelette voûté de l'homme sous sa peau presque translucide. Ce tas de ferraille est probablement tout ce qui lui reste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adamın kambur iskeletinin etrafında ufacık kalan derisi, neredeyse şeffaf görünüyor. O hurda yığını ise muhtemelen hayatında sahip olduğu her şey.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The skin shrunken around the man's hunched skeleton is almost translucent. That heap of junk really is likely to be everything he owns in this life.{/n}
